attributes.action: Broadcast The Traitors Finale on 24th January 2025 in Trafalgar Square.
attributes.additional_details: Bring the people of London together as a community, through a unique set of comradery we normally expect from purely sport events. This shows as a capital city, we are open to supporting others' interests at the same level.
attributes.background: Call up the BBC and agree to give them the permits and security measures to make it a success.
